nodes.text: The Mission to Asmeru occurred in 33 BBY before the Eriadu Trade Summit, when a team of Jedi and Judicials were dispatched to the planet Asmeru to confront agents of the terrorist network Nebula Front.

Seven Jedi—Qui-Gon Jinn and his Padawan Obi-Wan Kenobi, Yaddle, Ki-Adi-Mundi, Saesee Tiin, Vergere and Depa Billaba—traveled on board the Prominence to Asmeru to neutralize the Nebula Front terrorist network.
The seven Jedi arrived at Asmeru but were forced down on the planet where the seven swam to dry land. They camped there that night before encountering sentient slave species that led them through tunnels to the hanger of the Nebula Front where a small skirmish ensured.

Jinn, Kenobi and Mundi all stood back-to back using their green, blue and purple lightsabers respectively to deflect blaster fire. Elsewhere, Vergere led an assault on a fleet of stairs with her emerald lightsaber leading two judicials. Tiin led another team of judicials against terrorists entrenched in a narrow alley deflecting fire with his green bladed lightsaber while Masters Yaddle and Billaba deflected blaster fire.

Jinn, Mundi and Kenobi began to move deeper into the plaza to reach the vessels nearby but the trio needed to seek cover when terrorist reinforcements arrived. Both Tiin and Vergere then retreated while Yaddle and Depa Billaba remained at the back of the plaza.

Suddenly, Jinn's Bith informant led moderates into the charge against the militant terrorists and soon after a Republic Judicial Lancet began to land along with a few others. Following the skirmish, the Bith succumbed to wounds.
